data.text: À woilo, ɠimalai ɠa toligi wosu,
Toɠa loni ada ɠaaɠoozagiti maazuʋɛ pele ɠobaʋɛ,
Taa loaʋɛ, siɠi daaʋɛti,
«Nuiti, wa ɠa gè wooɠulazu wo ma,
Wɔiti wo la dɛ faa mɔinmɔin kwɛni, à kidafaawui maaɠɔli,
À woilo dɛɛ, mazɔlɔɔ faa ɓii ka gè bosu wo ma,
Mazɔlɔɔ gaama ɓɔɛiti ka gè ti wosu,
Dàawooiti kpein sɔlegɛ,
Ti pɛ gaaɠalagɛ naama nui ʋɛ, nii keleɠelegai,
Nà-kalagi gè bosu ga woye, à naa wɔin ɠɛ, é leʋe walii ʋa,
Mazɔlɔɔ ɠimalai vizɔgɛ kɔbu yɔlɔɠɔ ʋagɔiti ba,
«Nɔ̀un nà, nà ga ɠimalai, sèizuʋɛ ɠa ga kidafaawui,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠaazuluabai ɠa é ga, è zili ga faa ɲɔi.
Tɛnɛ goo ʋagɔiti, ta kidafaawui ta ga nɔ̀nɔ,
Masagiti ta masadai ɠɛɛzu nɔ̀un saɓui zu,
Saɓui zu ɠa kundiɠiiti ti kundiɠilai ɠɛɛzu la,
Nɔ̀un nà, naati kpein nɛɛʋɛ bɛ̀, niiti ti nɛ̀ɛzu ʋɛ,
Naavoloi ta lɛbiyai ta ga nɔ̀un nɔnɔ,
Nà-tɔnɔgi vizɔgɛ, é leʋe zanugi ʋa, anɛɛ zanu kitei,
Nà ziɛzu telebo pelei zu,
gè ʋa ani ʋagɔi ve naati bɛ, niiti ti nɛ̀ai ʋɛ,

«Gè ɠɛni Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ya,8:22 Gè ɠɛni Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ya: Tati pelei taɠiligaa ɓalaa ka ga niiti: Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI yiimazeɠeni ga ze ɓaa Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI gèyani ɓaa Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI sɔ̀lɔɔni ɓaa Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI kpɛ̀tɛni kaite ná-botiiti tɔɔzeizuʋɛ,
Gè zeini kaite wɔlɔwɔlɔ,
Siɛgi zu gè zɔlɔɔni da, kpoloɗɛi la ɠɛni dɛ ná,
Gè zɔlɔɔni pɛ, aisa gizeiti ti ʋa ɓɛtɛ,
GALA ge la ɠɛni dɛ zooi ɓɛtɛni, ta zou yɔɠɔzuʋɛti,
Gè ɠɛni ná niina, siɛgi zu é geeɠɔlɔgi zeini su la,
Siɛgi zu é tonaɓiingiti seini su la geezuʋɛ,
Siɛgi zu é kpoloɗɛi ɠwɛgi laani la, ziɛiti ti mina ɓudɛ maazu,
gè ɠɛni koba, eɠɛ ná-botiɠɛ ɠundiɠi,
gè ɗa kuai wo ná-etea ɓɛtɛai zu,
«Niizu dòun zunuiti, à woilo gòoi ma,
À woilo nà-kala gooiti ma,
Undaanɛ nu ɠa ga naati, niiti ti woilosu gòo ma,
Mazɔlɔɔ zɔi a kà, naa zɛnvui zɔlɔɔga,
Kɛlɛ zɔi nɔpɛ é la ɠoloni bɛ̀, naa ɠa ɓɔɠɔ ɓɔlɔzu,
